rev.comment: "Reception" is probably a better title, feel free to change
rev.diff:
Line 27: Line 27:
The Phun community shares scenes under a creative commons 3 by-nc-sa license at [http://www.phunland.com/phunbox/ phunbox], a community-built filesharing website. Users allow others to use their work, abiding by the CC3 by-nc-sa license. The phunbox has now been replaced with the [http://www.algodoo.com/algobox/ algobox], where it includes content created in Phun and in Algodoo.

==Notability==
+
==Reception==
Phun has been discussed and shown extensively in the Blogosphere, as well as being demonstrated at the [[Intel Developer Forum]] 2008 in [[San Francisco]]. <ref name="Use of Phun in Intel developers keynote">[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3dbD43tAXls Use of Phun in Intel developers keynote]</ref> It has also been displayed on the 2009 BETT show in London<ref name="Algodoo displayed on BETT" /><ref name="BBC Coverage of Classmate PC and Algodoo at BETT" />.
Phun has been discussed and shown extensively in the Blogosphere, as well as being demonstrated at the [[Intel Developer Forum]] 2008 in [[San Francisco]]. <ref name="Use of Phun in Intel developers keynote">[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3dbD43tAXls Use of Phun in Intel developers keynote]</ref> It has also been displayed on the 2009 BETT show in London<ref name="Algodoo displayed on BETT" /><ref name="BBC Coverage of Classmate PC and Algodoo at BETT" />.
